channel.title: [PI]Invisible Items When Dropped[PI]
channel.description: How do I make it so items appear on the ground when dropped? (PI)

item.title: [PI]Invisible Items When Dropped[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:391677”]well i see this line

//Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId());

try removing the //

see if that fixes your issues…

its located in the dropitem.java file.
\PI\runefdx\iHybrid Server\src\server\model\players\packets[/quote]
Worked tyvm.

Read full topic
